      • writeBookToDB

        public int writeBookToDB​(Book book,
                         int piece)
        Adds one or more pieces of new book(s) to database.
        Parameters:
        book - Book object which will be added to DB.
        piece - Number of books to add.
        Returns:
        number of added books (counter) - Everything is OK. -1 - Couldn't write to DB.

        Adds a new member to the DataBase
        Parameters:
        mem - Member or its descendant object which will be added to DB.
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK, -1 - Couldn't write to DB.

        Parameters:

        password - of the librarian
        Returns:

        java.sql.SQLException

        Create a list of books in the DB
        Parameters:
        list - Graphical list component which it adds books to.
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK, -1 - Couldn't create list.

      • selectedBook

        public Book selectedBook​(javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> list,
                         int borrowed)
        Returns a book object with the data of the selected book in the list
        Parameters:
        list - Graphical list object which includes the selected book (row).
        borrowed - 1 if look for borrowed book's ID otherwise 0.
        Returns:
        book object filled with data - Everything is OK, null - Couldn't select the book from DB.

      • searchBook

        public int searchBook​(java.lang.String filter,
                      java.lang.String search,
                      javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> list)
        Creates a list of books that match the search. If the filter is ID, then it has to be a full match, otherwise it's enough if the attribute contains the expression.
        Parameters:
        filter - Search attribute (category)
        search - Searching expression
        list - Graphical list object which contains the members
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK. -1 - DataBase fault, couldn't match, -2 - Filter wasn't selected before search, -3 - Filter was ID but the search expression wasn't a number.

      • removeBook

        public int removeBook​(java.lang.String bookID)
        Remove a book from the DB
        Parameters:
        bookID - Book's id which will be removed
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK. -1, Couldn't remove the book

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • searchMember

        public int searchMember​(java.lang.String filter,
                        java.lang.String search,
                        javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> list)
        Creates a list of members that match the search. If the filter is ID, then it has to be a full match, otherwise it's enough if the attribute contains the expression.
        Parameters:
        filter - Search attribute (category)
        search - Searching expression
        list - Graphical list object which contains the members
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK. -1 - DataBase fault, couldn't match, -2 - Filter wasn't selected before search, -3 - Filter was ID but the search expression wasn't a number.

      • countBook

        public int countBook​(Member member)
        Counts the borrowings which are belong to the current member.
        Parameters:
        member - Member object to whom it counts the borrowings.
        Returns:
        retVal >= 0 - Everything is OK, -1 - Couldn't count the number of borrowings;

      • changeBookBorrowStatus

        public int changeBookBorrowStatus​(java.lang.String bookId,
                                  int value)
        Changes a book borrow status in DB. If the book is borrowable, its value is 1 otherwise the value is 0.
        Parameters:
        bookId - Borrowed book's ID
        value - This value will be set.
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK, -1 - Coludn't change the status.

      • listOfActiveBorrowings

        public int listOfActiveBorrowings​(javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> list,
                                  Member member)
        Creates a list of active borrowings of a member.
        Parameters:
        list - Graphical list component which it adds borrowings to.
        member - Member object, current member who's current borrowings will be listed.
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK, -1 - Couldn't create list.

      • listOfOldBorrowings

        public int listOfOldBorrowings​(javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> list,
                               Member member)
        Creates a list of active borrowings of a member.
        Parameters:
        list - Graphical list component which it adds borrowings to.
        member - Member object, current member who's old borrowings will be listed.
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK, -1 - Couldn't create list.

      • searchBorrowing

        public int searchBorrowing​(java.lang.String filter,
                           java.lang.String search,
                           javax.swing.DefaultListModel<java.lang.String> list,
                           Member member,
                           int active)
        Creates a list of borrowings that match the search. If the filter is ID, then it has to be a full match, otherwise it's enough if the attribute contains the expression.
        Parameters:
        filter - Search attribute (category)
        search - Searching expression
        list - Graphical list component which it adds borrowings to.
        member - Member object who's borrowings will be filtered.
        active - Looks for active (1) or inactive (0) borrowings
        Returns:
        0 - Everything is OK. -1 - DataBase fault, couldn't match, -2 - Filter wasn't selected before search, -3 - Filter was ID but the search expression wasn't a number.

      • bookTakeBack

        public int bookTakeBack​(Borrow borrow)
        Updates the borrows table, and take back a book and finish the borrow
        Parameters:
        borrow - borrowing which will be finished.
        Returns:
        0 Everything is OK, -1 - Couldn't take back the book.

      • getBorrow

        public Borrow getBorrow​(Member member,
                        Book book)
        Select a borrow from the DB if borrow's member_id and book_id is matching with an id from books and members table
        Parameters:
        member - Member object who's borrowing will be selected.
        book - Book object which will be selected.
        Returns:
        Matched Borrow object with data - Everything is OK, null - Cuoldn't select the borrow.
